jd: From: Raj, Softcom Systems Inc raj@softcomsystems.com Reply to: raj@softcomsystems.com Position: Technical Project ManagerLocation: Phoenix, AZ (Onsite)Duration: Contract Job Description Note: Someone who has been technical on UI skills in prior life and later changed the role as an Agile PM ResponsibilitiesDrive delivery within a fast-paced agile environment. Work with a team of highly talented mobile engineers to build and deliver the web roadmap in the areas pertaining to - redesign of enterprise web site, new information architecture, native design language, consistent UI patterns and many other features to bring the customer experiences to life through our websites.A clear articulation and understanding of the architecture on Single Page applications, API design.Work with product development closely to understand the product and customer needs; and enable the product and customer vision for the company.Engage in hands-on design and ensure alignment of strategy, architecture, tools/methods with software engineers and architects to execute product roadmaps.Collaborate with a wide variety of stakeholders within business and technology teams to drive change required to execute product roadmaps.Collaborate within and across business units to prioritize, plan, and execute the development schedule for major product releases.
